title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 317: Featuring Bob McKenzie + Jody Shelley
description:
On Episode 317 of Spittinâ€™ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Jody Shelley and Bob McKenzie. The guys open the podcast talking all things NFL. Then Jody joined the podcast (26:08) to talk about the big PLD for Laine trade. He broke down his thoughts on the trade, playing for Torts, playing in Columbus and more. The guys also gave their opinions on the trade while touching on all the other NHL news from around the league. The boys are then joined by Bob McKenzie (1:18:31) to talk about his career, pissing off Gretzky, fighting Espo and tons more. The fellas wrap up talking Tiger Doc, new pucks, cavities and more


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
